ygData.subject: h2h skill cap 40 for lvl 12 HEF bard?
ygData.msgSnippet: I level 12 HEF - skill level is bad , guildmaster(s) says trained to the max limit - does that mean that hand to hand skill caps at 40? Or is it graduated
ygData.messageBody:
I level 12 HEF - skill level is "bad", guildmaster(s) says "trained to the
max limit" - does that mean that hand to hand skill caps at 40? Or is it
graduated level cap, where at higher levels the cap will rise unlike the LVL
* 5 + 5 formula that seems to work for sense heading, swimming, 1H slashing,
etc ...

If 40 is skill cap then I am extremely disappointed because that means that
I won't ever be able to be instrument wielding bard in combat ... if true,
is it also true for human bard? I wish I would have access to this type of
game documentation instead it's holed up inside some Verant programmer's
skull ...

And weapons is another story ... is 1H slashing capped at some point? What
is best bard weapon ... I spent 10 practices in piercing and got giant snake
fang but did I just waste practices?

L8
Naum
